meanings.sent1: The kind vaccinator gave me a shot to keep me healthy.
meanings.sent2: The vaccinator at the clinic was very gentle with the children.
meanings.sent3: The vaccinator joked that the needle was a magic wand.
meanings.sent4: She was a vaccinator, a protector against invisible enemies.
meanings.sent5: The vaccinator's smile reassured the nervous patients waiting in line.

meanings.definition: A device used to inject vaccines.
meanings.sent1: The vaccinator was filled with the life-saving liquid.
meanings.sent2: The nurse carefully handled the vaccinator during the vaccination drive.
meanings.sent3: The vaccinator accidentally squirted vaccine on the doctor's coat.
meanings.sent4: The vaccinator was like a tiny superhero needle, fighting off diseases.
meanings.sent5: The shiny vaccinator gleamed under the bright clinic lights.

meanings.definition: A substance that stimulates the production of antibodies.
meanings.sent1: The powerful vaccinator triggered my body's defenses.
meanings.sent2: The new vaccinator was designed to be more effective than traditional vaccines.
meanings.sent3: The vaccinator was like a wake-up call for my immune system.
meanings.sent4: The vaccinator worked like a superhero, training my body to fight off invaders.
meanings.sent5: The tiny vaccinator particles swirled in the liquid, ready to protect me.
